meanings.definition: The state or quality of being pursy.
meanings.sent1: Her pursinesses made it hard for her to run quickly.
meanings.sent2: The cat's pursinesses were evident as it lazily stretched out in the sun.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pursinesses, he attempted to join the dance class.
meanings.sent4: The pursinesses of the old house gave it a cozy, welcoming feel.
meanings.sent5: The pursinesses of the teddy bear made it perfect for cuddling.

meanings.sent1: After a big meal, his pursinesses were quite noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The pursinesses of the child were adorable as she pouted for more candy.
meanings.sent3: The pursinesses of the puppy were on full display as it begged for treats.
meanings.sent4: Her pursinesses during the exercise class made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent5: The pursinesses of the squirrel trying to fit more nuts in its cheeks were comical.

meanings.sent1: The pursinesses of the bulldog made it look extra cute.
meanings.sent2: His pursinesses were endearing to everyone who met him.
meanings.sent3: The pursinesses of the baby's cheeks were irresistible to pinch.
meanings.sent4: Despite his pursinesses, he was surprisingly agile on the soccer field.
meanings.sent5: The pursinesses of the clouds in the sky made them appear fluffy and soft.
